definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 這是一個開創性的時刻，週一。

sentences.english: "Tan Yi Lu, " is a ground-breaking comparison of Chinese and Western poetics.
sentences.chinese: 《談藝錄》是一部具有開創性的中西比較詩論。

sentences.english: It predicts a ground breaking year. And we are not even half way through.
sentences.chinese: 這預示着開創性的一年。我們呢？

sentences.english: And to think we once thought spray-on bandages were revolutionary.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾認爲噴塗繃帶是開創性醫療技術。

sentences.english: It's all down to founder Tadashi Yanai's groundbreaking approach.
sentences.chinese: 這都拜創辦人柳井正開創性的做法之賜。

sentences.english: Kelley has a history of groundbreaking teaching methods.
sentences.chinese: 過去凱利曾經嘗試過開創性的教學方法。

sentences.english: This is another groundbreaking, first time ever surgery.
sentences.chinese: 這是外科手術史上另一個開創性的例子。

sentences.english: Moxi's studies possesses creative meaning in history of Chinese traditional opera criticism.
sentences.chinese: 在中國戲曲批評史上有其開創性的意義。

sentences.english: "This was a groundbreaking experiment," Wojtak said.
sentences.chinese: 瓦忒克說，“這是一項開創性的試驗。”

sentences.english: They’re also continuing their pioneering research into flying decapitated fruit flies.
sentences.chinese: 他們還繼續進行果蠅斬首的開創性研究。

sentences.english: China is doing something path-breaking here.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在做的事情是開創性的。

sentences.english: Some original work on genetic engineering of Ganoderma lucidum have been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 論文在靈芝基因工程方面做了一些開創性的研究。

sentences.english: We have done a path breaking study on the cost of air pollution in China.
sentences.chinese: 我們圍繞中國空氣污染的代價做了一個開創性的研究。

sentences.english: What I neglected to mention was the controversy around Peary's pioneering accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 我忘記提圍繞皮爾裏開創性成就的爭議了。

sentences.english: This is a very serious piece of research.
sentences.chinese: 這是一項很嚴肅的研究，很有開創性。

sentences.english: Benjamin made a creative research on the art in the mechanical reproduction period.
sentences.chinese: 本雅明對機械複製時代藝術進行了開創性研究。

definition: see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
